name: The Gunslinger's Ballad
description:
The Gunslinger's Ballad is a short game about being an actor on a western set. You have to draw and shoot when the music stops. Shoot too early and the director will fire you. Shoot too late and you'll get shot.

  • Press [SPACE] to draw/shoot/advance the dialog

This game was made for the Trijam #167 gamejam. In this gamejam you try to create a game within three hours around a given theme. This editions theme was "Heightened senses". I thought it would be fun to have the player heightened there sense of sound to survive the game.
